con:resource.name: reports run Overdraft List By Office

con:request.name: Overdraft List by date and office
Overdraft Count by date and office

con:resource.name: reports run Overdraft List By Client Account

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "clientId" , "" + json."resourceId") messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "accountId" , "" + json."savingsId")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "accountId" , "" + json."resourceId")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "penaltyChargeId" , "" + json."resourceId")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonlist = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftDtId" , "" + jsonlist.data.last().row[0])

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonlist = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftDtId" , "" + jsonlist.data.last().row[0])

con:config.script: context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "clientId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "customerId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "accountId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "currency" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "productId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "interestRate" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "accountNumber" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftLimit" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftDtId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "startDate" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "dueDate" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "term" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftProductName" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "status" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "subStatus" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "balance" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "transaction1TypeId" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "transaction1Date" , "") context.testCase.setPropertyValue( "transaction1Amount" , "")

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "clientId" , "" + json[0]."entityId") messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "customerId" , "" + json[0]."entityExternalId")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "accountId" , "" + json.savingsAccounts[0]."id") messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "currency" , "" + json.savingsAccounts[0]."currency"."code")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonlist = slurper.parseText response
def startDateStr = jsonlist.last()."startDate"[0] + '-' + jsonlist.last()."startDate"[1] + '-' + jsonlist.last()."startDate"[2] def dueDateStr = jsonlist.last()."dueDate"[0] + '-' + jsonlist.last()."dueDate"[1] + '-' + jsonlist.last()."dueDate"[2]
def startDate = Date.parse("yyyy-M-d", startDateStr) def dueDate = Date.parse("yyyy-M-d", dueDateStr)
def term = dueDate - startDate
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftDtId" , "" + jsonlist.last()."id") messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "startDate" , "" + startDateStr) messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "dueDate" , "" + dueDateStr) messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "term" , "" + term)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent
def slurper = new JsonSlurper() def json = slurper.parseText response
messageExchange.modelItem.testCase.setPropertyValue( "overdraftProductName" , "" + json."name")
